MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML8 postcode area of Carluke. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00pm to safely complete repair works on our underground cable network located on Sandy Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30pm on Friday, 26th February 2021
